Hello
 
I'm  Katsuyori Takaeda club in Japan. 

Now we are publicly seeking=
 an illustration of Katsuyori that is to be an advertising character(Public=
 Competition for Mascot Design)
We also receive applications from overseas,=
 so if you are interested in this project, 
 please see our English page th=
at describes application
http://katsuyoritosa.web.fc2.com/characterinternat=
ionak.html
 
(selection method)
The winner will be selected through the pub=
lic voting at the event for (August 22 )The 400 Year Anniversary After Katu=
yori's Death (sponsored by the Association of Takeda Katsuyori in Tosa) and=
 will be chosen by the executive board of the association
 
We are going to=
 commoditize the illustration and sell it in the event on October 10th.(The=
 400 Year Anniversary event)

We also perform entertainments such as teodor=
i daiko (hand-dancing Japanese drums) that it is said Katsuyori introduced
=
 
Many people come to the venue and our Web site to see the publicly sought=
 illustration, so the author will have opportunity to gain publicity
